column1: The city is a regional transport hub on the Volga–Don Canal.  A railway and M4 highway pass nearby. Bus routes were launched in 1954. There are presently thirty bus routes. Trolleybuses have been running since 1977. There are currently six trolleybus routes in the city.  Volgodonsk port has a strategic importance as access to major ports of different countries.
